question: Which statement about AWT event handling is CORRECT?
options: AWT uses inheritance-based event handling for all components
Every event source directly processes its own events
Event handling in AWT follows the Delegation Event Model
Listeners are optional for handling events in AWT
correctAnswer: Event handling in AWT follows the Delegation Event Model

question: What happens if multiple listeners are registered for the same event source in AWT?
options: Only the last registered listener receives the event
Events are delivered in reverse order of registration
All registered listeners receive the event sequentially
correctAnswer: All registered listeners receive the event sequentially

question: Which AWT component generates an ItemEvent instead of an ActionEvent?
